languages.text: "Так заповедовали нам предки, так велели святые, среди которых чтим особо Друз-Воитель. Так желает Император!"
"Thus taught our forebears. Thus said the saints, among which we honour Drusus the Warrior above the rest. Thus wills the Emperor!"
languages.original_text: "Так заповедовали нам предки, так велели святые, среди которых чтим особо Друз-Воитель. Так желает Император!"

traits.locale_text: "Thus taught our forebears. Thus said the saints, among which we honour Drusus the Warrior above the rest. Thus wills the Emperor!"
"Thus taught our forebears. Thus said the saints, among which we honour Drusus the Warrior above the rest. Thus wills the Emperor!"
"Thus taught our forebears. Thus said the saints, among which we honour Drusus the Warrior above the rest. Thus wills the Emperor!"
"Thus taught our forebears. Thus said the saints, among which we honour Drusus the Warrior above the rest. Thus wills the Emperor!"
"Thus taught our forebears. Thus said the saints, among which we honour Drusus the Warrior above the rest. Thus wills the Emperor!"

languages.text: “这就是我们先祖的教导，也是圣人们的教导，其中包括我们尊敬的勇士德鲁苏斯。这边是帝皇的意志！”
languages.original_text: "Thus taught our forebears. Thus said the saints, among which we honour Drusus the Warrior above the rest. Thus wills the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: “这就是我们先祖的教导，也是圣人们的教导，其中包括我们尊敬的勇士德鲁苏斯。这边是帝皇的意志！”

languages.text: «Así enseñaron nuestros antepasados. Así anunciaron los santos, entre los cuales honramos a Drusus el Guerrero por encima de los demás. ¡Así lo quiere el Emperador!».
languages.original_text: "Thus taught our forebears. Thus said the saints, among which we honour Drusus the Warrior above the rest. Thus wills the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: «Así enseñaron nuestros antepasados. Así anunciaron los santos, entre los cuales honramos a Drusus el Guerrero por encima de los demás. ¡Así lo quiere el Emperador!».

languages.text: 「私たちの先祖はそのように伝えてきました。聖人たちは何よりも戦士ドラサスを尊敬せよと言いました。それが皇帝のご意思なのです！」
languages.original_text: "Thus taught our forebears. Thus said the saints, among which we honour Drusus the Warrior above the rest. Thus wills the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: 「私たちの先祖はそのように伝えてきました。聖人たちは何よりも戦士ドラサスを尊敬せよと言いました。それが皇帝のご意思なのです！」

languages.text: "So lehrten es unsere Vorfahren. Und so sprachen die Heiligen, von denen wir Drusus den Krieger besonders verehren. So will es der Imperator!"
languages.original_text: "Thus taught our forebears. Thus said the saints, among which we honour Drusus the Warrior above the rest. Thus wills the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: "So lehrten es unsere Vorfahren. Und so sprachen die Heiligen, von denen wir Drusus den Krieger besonders verehren. So will es der Imperator!"

languages.text: « Telle est la leçon de nos ancêtres. Ainsi ont parlé les saints et parmi eux, nous rendons le plus bel hommage à Drusus le Guerrier. Car telle est la volonté de l'Empereur ! »
languages.original_text: "Thus taught our forebears. Thus said the saints, among which we honour Drusus the Warrior above the rest. Thus wills the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: « Telle est la leçon de nos ancêtres. Ainsi ont parlé les saints et parmi eux, nous rendons le plus bel hommage à Drusus le Guerrier. Car telle est la volonté de l'Empereur ! »

languages.text: "Öncüllerimiz bize böyle öğretti. Azizlerimiz bize böyle söyledi. Savaşçı Drusus'u da onların en onurlusu addederiz. İmparator'un iradesi bu şekildedir!"
languages.original_text: "Thus taught our forebears. Thus said the saints, among which we honour Drusus the Warrior above the rest. Thus wills the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: "Öncüllerimiz bize böyle öğretti. Azizlerimiz bize böyle söyledi, ki Savaşçı Drusus'u onların en onurlusu addederiz. İmparator'un iradesi bu şekildedir!"
